name: Pour Gel

field_types.name: Gel
object_types: 50 mL 0.8 Percent Agarose Gel in Gel Box

protocol:
class Protocol

  def main

    n = operations.length
    
    show do
        note "#{n} operations"
        note "#{n/10+1} gel(s) needed"
    end

    gels = (1..n/10+1).collect do |i|
      produce new_collection "50 mL 0.8 Percent Agarose Gel in Gel Box", 1, 12
    end

    operations.each_with_index do |op,i|
      op.output("Gel").set collection: gels[i/10], row: 1, column: i%10+1
    end
    
    t = operations.start_table
                  .output_collection("Gel")
                  .output_row("Gel")
                  .output_column("Gel")
                  .end_table
    
    show do 
      title "Output Table"
      table t.all.render
    end
    
    operations.store(io: "output") 
    
    return {}
    
  end

end
